title: PBE Signups?
body: Well I have a question. Does anyone know when PBE Signups will open? Because there are so many new things coming to League that I wanna try out. That's all. Hope you open registration soon rito.

replies.body: It looks like a Rioter mentioned that they will be opened again in October, but we haven't gotten any official word on when exactly PBE signups are going to launch again.

I don't know, I think they have enough active testers on PBE right now or the fact the PBE registration system was total garbage they are changing up the whole idea behind it. How the registration works, who is eligible, the whole process in general.
